name: @mk-knight23/vibe-ai-cli
description: The open source AI coding agent - 75+ providers, free models, LSP enabled, privacy-first

10.0.0: Alias /t now maps to /tangent (was /tools) - use /tl or /tools
Command substitution ($() and ``) now requires approval
Memory storage migrated from JSON to SQLite (store.db)
9.0.0: Provider API responses now include 'thinking' field
Web search moved to optional feature (disabled by default)
Custom instructions now use .vibe/ directory structure

10.1.0: Safe defaults - Tools OFF in headless mode unless --allow-tools
YOLO mode - --dangerously-skip-permissions bypasses all checks
Slash command /session - Manage sessions from interactive mode
Slash command /diff - View and manage file changes with checkpoints
Slash command /bug - Generate bug report template
Slash command /context - View active steering, rules, MCP
Slash command /mode - Switch agent modes (ask/debug/architect)
Checkpoint system - Track, save, and revert file changes
Enhanced audit - /audit stats, recent, export with filtering
Batch approvals - /approve all, deny, per-operation control
Provider fallback - Auto-failover with rate limit handling
Provider health - Track provider status and availability
Mode system - Ask/Debug/Architect/Orchestrator presets
Auto mode detection - Detect mode from user input
Enhanced steering - Directory-based, global, Kiro-compatible
Steering hooks - onFileWrite, onSessionStart events
Unified MCP manager - stdio + SSE transport support
MCP streaming - streamToolCall for SSE servers
MCP templates - filesystem, git, fetch, memory presets
Enhanced custom commands - /cmd list, new, delete, show
Command aliases - Multiple names for same command
Command categories - Group commands by category
Batch mode - Process multiple prompts from file (vibe batch)
Project rules - AI behavior rules in .vibe/rules/*.md
Project memory - Long-term knowledge persistence
SSE MCP transport - HTTP/SSE support for MCP servers
Export system - JSON, Markdown, HTML, CSV export
Workflow checkpoints - Approval gates in workflows
Parallel workflow steps - Concurrent agent execution
Research pipeline - Multi-source research with synthesis
Analysis pipeline - Data comparison, extraction, matrices
Report pipeline - Structured document generation
Automation pipeline - DevOps, CI/CD, infrastructure tasks
10.0.0: Provider Registry - 20+ built-in providers, config-driven extensibility
Rollback Stack - Undo mutating actions on failure or cancel
MCP Integration - Model Context Protocol server support
Non-interactive mode - vibe ask for one-shot prompts
SQLite storage - Sessions, messages, permissions persistence
LSP diagnostics - Read-only access to TypeScript/ESLint errors
9.0.0: Extended thinking support for complex reasoning
Web search integration with credibility scoring
Real-time streaming UI with cost tracking
BDD test generation and self-healing tests
Advanced security scanning with CVE integration

scripts.build:v8: tsc && echo '✅ v8.0.2 Ultimate Build Complete'

author: KAZI
